artist: Georg Philipp Rugendas I; Christian Rugendas
description: post battle scene; injured soldier under a tree seated on a stone receiving treatment on shoulder; other mounted men at left and at right under tree; several wounded or dead laying on ground center foreground; cannon at right; large round structure at left in distance
inscription:
Signature, Date, and Inscription 

in black on sheet below image: G.P. Rugendas infentor pinx. et del. A\'o 1696 Li 4 di S genaro in Augusta    g.1.   Christiano Rugendas sculp et excud. Aug Vindel | on sheet in pencil: 2-338
